name: Path of Aridity
description:
The Lord of Undeads is going back in human's world to rob caravans and fastly take control all over the planet! You, as a faithful servant of the Lord, need to help him with this.
PS: The combat is in progress. We will publish hot fixes in a few days. Some combinations doesn't work and there are some bugs. But we did our best :")
Hot fix 28.02.2002: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1tnVOwcV2y9uEzuzZwsXj3N2WQpY21gMb/view?usp=shari...
